description: A special committee of MHKs will now re-examine the government's planned reforms.
title: Isle of Man education reform plans face extra hurdle
title_page: Isle of Man education reform plans face extra hurdle - BBC News
maintext: The secretary of the National Association of Head Teachers, Robert Kelsall, said the current bill was "not fit for purpose" and the union was "extremely disappointed" it had passed its second reading.
